channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7366] getDatabase using direct sql
item.description:
Given that get_database is easily one of the most frequent calls made on the metastore, we should have the ability to bypass datanucleus for that, and use direct SQL instead.

This was something that I did initially as part of debugging HIVE-7368, but I think that given the frequency of this call, it's useful to have it in mainline direct sql.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12660760

The comment correction for isConfigEnabled is not quite correct, we still use it in tx-es if enabled. That code checks 2 config settings.
Can you post an RB?
Unsetting patch-available, since some of the errors reported are relevant to this patch. Looking into it.
Will do. I still need to update the patch a bit, and will upload it to rb with that.
Updated patch to fix test failures - the test failures were due to my change not taking into account recent role/owner changes.
sershe, I've created a reviewboard link for the latest patch : https://reviews.apache.org/r/24574/
And, ah, I see what you mean about the comment not being accurate - I'll edit it for the next diff with any other changes you suggest.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12674597
sershe, I've updated the patch with your latest comments, could you please check to see if this is okay?
Thanks, Sergey, committed to 0.14 and trunk.

Any doc needed, or is this strictly behind-the-scenes?

By the way, the wiki only mentions direct SQL in three parameter descriptions:

  • Configuration Properties – hive.metastore.integral.jdo.pushdown
  • Configuration Properties – hive.metastore.try.direct.sql
  • Configuration Properties – hive.metastore.try.direct.sql.ddl

No doc needed for this, this is strictly behind-the-scenes.

And yup, those look like those should be the only params needed - they gate whether or not direct-sql will be used. I toyed with the idea of adding one more "hive.metastore.try.direct.sql.experimental" for the newer experimental direct sql extensions, to allow a phased introduction of these extensions but was convinced ashutoshc would get mad at me if I did.
Thanks sushanth. Maybe you could have that other config if you called it "hive.metastore.try.direct.sql.but.dont.tell.ashutosh" ... well, maybe not.
I am glad sanity prevailed : ) We need to spare our users from death by thousand configs : )
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
